name: A Small Fable
description:
Hidden Tavern Games is a collaboration between TooTicky2 and QuantumSno . Pull up a barstool and lend us your ear -- we have stories we'd love to share.

DEV NOTES

      Coding: Unity (QuantumSno)

     Art & Animation: Aseprite (TooTicky2)

      Music & SFX: Audacity, BFXR
